author: JoshuaMauk
title: Fun build.
review: I am a LEGO Store Employee and we love our building events.  Getting to help young builders put these mini builds together is one of the best parts of my job.  I really like the techniques that the last few have used and this one in particular has some great pieces and surprising twists.  Another employee and I like to challenge ourselves by building these while they're still sealed in the bag.  I beat him this month and look forward to our next event.  See you folks on the next First Tuesday.
